ARABIC: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So he slipped off to his household and brought a fattened calf.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So he hurried to the house and brought a fatted calf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he went back to his family and brought a fat roasted calf
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He went quietly to his wife and returned to his guests with a fat, roasted calf.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then he went to his home – so he brought a healthy calf.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he turned to his household, and brought out a roasted calf.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he turned aside to his family secretly and brought a fat (roasted) calf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then he went apart unto his housefolk so that they brought a fatted calf;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then he turned quickly to his household, and brought a fatted calf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he turned away privately Unto his household, and brought a calf fatted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he retired to his family and brought a fat [roasted] calf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then he turned quickly to his household, brought out a fatted calf,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he turned to his household, so brought out a roasted calf [as the property of Ibrahim (Abraham) was mainly cows].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So he turned to his household and brought a fattened calf.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he slipped away to his family, and brought a fatted calf.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:26] Then he went aside to his family, secretly, and brought a fat calf — in sūrat Hūd [it is said], a roasted calf [Q. 11:69] —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then he went apart unto his housefolk so that they brought a fatted calf) a roasted, fatted calf to his guests;
